title: install_mlflow() in R yields: Error installing package(s): "mlflow==1.17.1"
body:
### System information
- Windows 10
- MLflow installed from binary: pip install mlflow
- MLflow version: 1.17.0
- Python version: 3.6.13
- R version: 4.1.0
- RStudio version: 1.4.1106
- Exact command to reproduce:
```
devtools::install_github("mlflow/mlflow", subdir = "mlflow/R/mlflow")
mlflow::install_mlflow()
```

### Describe the problem
I try to install the latest version of the mlflow package from github in R.
Open RStudio. Execute:
```
devtools::install_github("mlflow/mlflow", subdir = "mlflow/R/mlflow")
mlflow::install_mlflow()
```
The first statement executes succesfully. So the mlflow package is installed and available in R (version 1.17.1).
However, the second statement yields an error:

```
ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement mlflow==1.17.1 (from versions: 0.0.1, 0.1.0, 0.2.0, 0.2.1, 0.3.0, 0.4.0, 0.4.1, 0.4.2, 0.5.0, 0.5.1, 0.5.2, 0.6.0, 0.7.0, 0.8.0, 0.8.1, 0.8.2, 0.9.0, 0.9.0.1, 0.9.1, 1.0.0, 1.1.0, 1.1.1.dev0, 1.2.0, 1.3.0, 1.4.0, 1.5.0, 1.6.0, 1.7.0, 1.7.1, 1.7.2, 1.8.0, 1.9.0, 1.9.1, 1.10.0, 1.11.0, 1.12.0, 1.12.1, 1.13, 1.13.1, 1.14.0, 1.14.1, 1.15.0, 1.16.0, 1.17.0)
ERROR: No matching distribution found for mlflow==1.17.1
Error: Error installing package(s): "mlflow==1.17.1"
```

### Other info / logs

Output in the console:

```
Creating conda environment r-mlflow-1.17.1
Collecting package metadata (current_repodata.json): ...working... done
Solving environment: ...working... done

## Package Plan ##

  environment location: C:\Users\willy\.conda\envs\r-mlflow-1.17.1

  added / updated specs:
    - python=3.6


The following NEW packages will be INSTALLED:

  certifi            conda-forge/win-64::certifi-2021.5.30-py36ha15d459_0
  pip                conda-forge/noarch::pip-21.1.2-pyhd8ed1ab_0
  python             conda-forge/win-64::python-3.6.13-h39d44d4_0_cpython
  python_abi         conda-forge/win-64::python_abi-3.6-1_cp36m
  setuptools         conda-forge/win-64::setuptools-49.6.0-py36ha15d459_3
  vc                 conda-forge/win-64::vc-14.2-hb210afc_4
  vs2015_runtime     conda-forge/win-64::vs2015_runtime-14.28.29325-h5e1d092_4
  wheel              conda-forge/noarch::wheel-0.36.2-pyhd3deb0d_0
  wincertstore       conda-forge/win-64::wincertstore-0.2-py36ha15d459_1006


Preparing transaction: ...working... done
Verifying transaction: ...working... done
Executing transaction: ...working... done
#
# To activate this environment, use
#
#     $ conda activate r-mlflow-1.17.1

#
# To deactivate an active environment, use
#
#     $ conda deactivate

ERROR: Could not find a version that satisfies the requirement mlflow==1.17.1 (from versions: 0.0.1, 0.1.0, 0.2.0, 0.2.1, 0.3.0, 0.4.0, 0.4.1, 0.4.2, 0.5.0, 0.5.1, 0.5.2, 0.6.0, 0.7.0, 0.8.0, 0.8.1, 0.8.2, 0.9.0, 0.9.0.1, 0.9.1, 1.0.0, 1.1.0, 1.1.1.dev0, 1.2.0, 1.3.0, 1.4.0, 1.5.0, 1.6.0, 1.7.0, 1.7.1, 1.7.2, 1.8.0, 1.9.0, 1.9.1, 1.10.0, 1.11.0, 1.12.0, 1.12.1, 1.13, 1.13.1, 1.14.0, 1.14.1, 1.15.0, 1.16.0, 1.17.0)

```
